resources.string:
Chess for All is a PGN-Editor/-Viewer.

Engine Play
This program is using a chess engine as a service. Please download an Engine from the market for playing.

The following engines are supported:
* Stockfish Chess
* Chess Engines

You can select/change an engine with: menu > Engines > E1 or E2

If no engine is selected the program will detect an engine on your device automatically.

Java engine routines from Peter Ã–sterlund (DroidFish)

Using UCI chess engines by Aart Bik

Chesspresso(chess logic) by Bernhard Seybold

Graphic elements by Lars Streblow

Translations:
French - Eric Gallula
Spanish - Sergio Revinelli, Sergio Ballesteros
Russian - Ark (hark, arkpc)

Chess for All is developed by Karl Schreiner

License
